thread.title: redBit KIDZ Launches "Spotty & Friends - Playground", an Intuitive App for Children
thread.title_full: redBit KIDZ Launches "Spotty & Friends - Playground", an Intuitive App for Children

title: redBit KIDZ Launches "Spotty & Friends - Playground", an Intuitive App for Children
text: redBit KIDZ Launches "Spotty & Friends - Playground", an Intuitive App for Children Created with an intuitive and child-friendly interface "Spotty & Friends - Playground" is full of hilarious interactions that stimulate creativity and make the educational experience unique. ROME, ITALY, September 03,   Spotty is a brave and enterprising little bunny that begins a new adventure. From the countryside to the sea and then to the top of the mountains he enjoys playing puzzles, music, shapes and colors with the cute little animals he meets. The game features simple and intuitive interactions suitable for preschoolers (kids from 2 to 5 years old) and it's free to play and does not contain any advertising. It contains a fully explorable environment, in which the player can tap on animals and objects to discover what's happening and 4 mini games developed to sharpen cognitive skills through proactive interaction. Spotty & Friends - Playground is available on iOS and Android in six different languages (English, Italian, German, French, Spanish, and Russian). iOS App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id977138798 Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.redbitgames.mrspottyplaygroundAbout redBit games redBit games is a team of young and enthusiastic people who make games and apps, with 4 million active users across more than 30 games for iOS, Android and Amazon. redBit KIDZ is the new brand, specially tailored for kids from 2 to 5 years to stimulate their cognitive development in a funny and original way. To learn more, please visit: http://www.kidz.redbitgames.it # # #
